name: Poly Wavetable
description:
This algorithm is inspired by the original Poly Wavetable algorithm on the disting EX. It is a complete polyphonic synthesizer, using wavetable oscillators. Each voice has two envelopes, a filter and an LFO.

Please refer to the section 'Common polysynth features' above, and to the section on wavetables on the MicroSD card, also above.

There are a number of in-depth videos on the disting EX version of this algorithm, which mostly apply equally well to this version. The YouTube playlist is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ytLfM9xyRY&list=PLlY5j4QDwxWunH7I7wvOGYGNsRvCMZ2Hx

parameters.name: Wave offset
parameters.description: An offset for the wavetable position, added to that set from the wave input.

parameters.name: Wave spread
parameters.description: An amount by which to spread out the per-voice wavetable positions.

parameters.name: Attack (Envelope 1)
parameters.description: Envelope attack time. Range 1ms-15s.

parameters.name: Decay (Envelope 1)
parameters.description: Envelope decay time. Range 20ms-15s.

parameters.name: Sustain (Envelope 1)
parameters.description: Envelope sustain level.

parameters.name: Release (Envelope 1)
parameters.description: Envelope release time. Range 10ms-30s.

parameters.name: Attack shape (Envelope 1)
parameters.description: '0' is highly exponential; '127' is almost linear.

parameters.name: Decay shape (Envelope 1)
parameters.description: Envelope decay & release shape.

parameters.name: Filter freq
parameters.description: The filter frequency, specified as a MIDI note number.

parameters.name: Filter Q
parameters.description: The filter resonance.

parameters.name: LFO speed
parameters.description: The LFO speed. Range 0.01Hz-10Hz.

parameters.name: LFO retrigger
enum_values: Mono (all LFOs are retriggered when the first note is played)

parameters.name: LFO spread
parameters.description:
Sets the phase to which LFOs are retriggered. The value, in degrees (360Â° per LFO cycle), is multiplied by the voice number to give the initial LFO phase.
When retrigger is off, this sets the phase relationship between the free-running LFOs.

parameters.name: Veloc -> volume
parameters.description: The amount by which the note velocity affects the note volume.

parameters.name: Veloc -> wave
parameters.description: The amount by which the note velocity affects the wavetable position.

parameters.name: Veloc -> filter
parameters.description: The amount by which the note velocity affects the filter frequency.

parameters.name: Pitch -> wave
parameters.description: The amount by which the note pitch affects the wavetable position.

parameters.name: Pitch -> filter
parameters.description: The amount by which the note pitch affects the filter frequency.

parameters.name: Env-1 -> wave
parameters.description: The amount by which envelope 1 affects the wavetable position.

parameters.name: Env-1 -> filter
parameters.description: The amount by which envelope 1 affects the filter frequency.

parameters.name: Env-2 -> wave
parameters.description: The amount by which envelope 2 affects the wavetable position.

parameters.name: Env-2 -> filter
parameters.description: The amount by which envelope 2 affects the filter frequency.

parameters.name: Env-2 -> pitch
parameters.description: The amount by which envelope 2 affects the note pitch.

parameters.name: LFO -> wave
parameters.description: The amount by which the LFO affects the wavetable position.

parameters.name: LFO -> filter
parameters.description: The amount by which the LFO affects the filter frequency.

parameters.name: LFO -> pitch
parameters.description: The amount by which the LFO affects the note pitch.

parameters.name: Press -> volume
parameters.description: The amount by which pressure (per note for MPE) affects the note volume.

parameters.name: Press -> wave
parameters.description: The amount by which pressure (per note for MPE) affects the wavetable position.

parameters.name: Press -> filter
parameters.description: The amount by which pressure (per note for MPE) affects the filter frequency.

parameters.name: MPE Y -> volume
parameters.description: The amount by which the MPE Y dimension affects the note volume.

parameters.name: MPE Y -> wave
parameters.description: The amount by which the MPE Y dimension affects the wavetable position.

parameters.name: MPE Y -> filter
parameters.description: The amount by which the MPE Y dimension affects the filter frequency.

parameters.name: Unison
parameters.description: The number of voices to play simultaneously for each note triggered.

parameters.name: Unison detune
parameters.description: The detune amount when Unison is active.

parameters.name: Output spread
parameters.description: The amount of output spread.

parameters.name: Spread mode
enum_values: Spread by voice (voices are spread across the stereo field from left to right)
Spread by voice 2 (voices alternate in an increasing manner across the stereo field)
Spread by pitch (voices are spread according to their pitch, with note 48 at the centre)

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: Applies an overall output gain.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: The MIDI channel to listen on.

parameters.name: MPE channels
parameters.description: Controls how the algorithm will respond to MPE.

parameters.name: I2C channel
parameters.description: Sets the I2C channel.

parameters.name: Max voices
parameters.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneous voices.

parameters.name: Sustain
parameters.description: Directly controls the sustain (like a MIDI sustain pedal).

parameters.name: Bend range
parameters.description: The MIDI pitch bend range.

input_ports.name: Wave input
input_ports.description: Input bus to control the position in the wavetable (0-28)

input_ports.name: Wave input
input_ports.description: Which input bus to use to control the position in the wavetable.

input_ports.name: Pitchbend input
input_ports.description: Sets the input bus to use for pitch bend.

output_ports.name: Left output
output_ports.description: Output bus for left audio channel (1-28)

output_ports.name: Right output
output_ports.description: Output bus for right audio channel (0-28)
